blocks.title: Your Article Title Here
blocks.subtitle: A compelling subtitle that hooks the reader
blocks.author: yellowCircle

blocks.content: Your compelling first paragraph that grabs attention and sets up the problem you're addressing. Be direct and confrontational.
This isn't another pitch for a solution. This is about the real problem nobody wants to talk about.
First section content explaining the core issue. Use specific examples and data.
These aren't abstractions. They represent real people caught in organizational dysfunction.
Second section diving deeper into the problem mechanics.
"A powerful quote that illustrates the point you're making."
blocks.author: Anonymous Professional, Company Type

blocks.content: Third section making it personal with specific personas.

blocks.description: Promised visibility and control. Reality: maintains workarounds to reconcile what systems say versus what's real. Spends off-hours fixing data.
blocks.cost: 15+ hours/week on reconciliation. Considering leaving the field.
blocks.name: Alex

blocks.content: Promised visibility and control. Reality: maintains workarounds to reconcile what systems say versus what's real. Spends off-hours fixing data.
**Cost:** 15+ hours/week on reconciliation. Considering leaving the field.

blocks.description: Hired to unlock insights. Reality: spends 80% of time cleaning data that should have been structured correctly.
blocks.cost: Zero strategic analysis. Team sees them as slow when they're drowning.
blocks.name: Jordan

blocks.content: Hired to unlock insights. Reality: spends 80% of time cleaning data that should have been structured correctly.
**Cost:** Zero strategic analysis. Team sees them as slow when they're drowning.

items.title: Process gaps blamed on tools
items.description: Instead of fixing workflows, organizations buy new software.

items.title: Organizational friction invisible
items.description: Incentives are misaligned and tools can't fix that.

items.title: Technical debt compounds
items.description: Every workaround creates two more. Nobody budgets for cleanup.

items.title: Truth-telling disincentivized
items.description: People who see problems are punished for raising them.

items: First action item with clear guidance
Second action item explaining the approach
Third action item with expected outcome
Fourth action item connecting to bigger picture

blocks.content: The bottom line: Your main argument summarized in one powerful statement. This is the key insight readers should take away.
